mapper.select: SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS SUM_MONTH_COST, B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, A.DIVISION_THREE, B.DIVISION_MONTH FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_CD A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 5 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 GROUP BY B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, A.DIVISION_THREE, B.DIVISION_MONTH ORDER BY B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ, B.DIVISION_MONTH

SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS SUM_MONTH_COST, B.DIVISION_MONTH FROM MAINTENANCE_COST_CD A JOIN MAINTENANCE_COST_HISTORY B ON (A.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ = B.MAINTENANCE_COST_SEQ) WHERE SUBSTR(DIVISION_YEAR, 0, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND SUBSTR(DIVISION_MONTH, 0, 2) BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 5 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 1 GROUP BY B.DIVISION_MONTH ORDER BY B.DIVISION_MONTH
